synopsis: In episode #13, Devam shares his transformative journey after quitting his job, exploring self-discovery through travel, DJing, and creative expression. He reflects on the importance of taking breaks, connecting with oneself, and embracing life's uncertainties, all while encouraging listeners to pursue their passions authentically.
quotes: Sometimes it takes an incredible amount of courage and privilege to take that leap into something unknown.
We're not on this planet to slave away and be like productivity monkeys creating value for our bosses.
You can make a good show and the world may not be ready for it.
If I go back to software, I want to do it because I like it.
The goal of this break is to learn how to breathe.
Letting go of big expectations makes such a big difference.
It’s important to recognize that you have the choice to participate in the life you want.
Sometimes it’s enough to just breathe.
Not everyone you meet that you think is cool is gonna be open to that.
I just thought that was a cool idea: 'Oh, I’m in transit.'
